overview:
Arroyo began his career in corporate finance, working for a Fortune 500 pet supplies company. In that role, Arroyo helped coordinate store inventory counts for 800+ stores and $1 billion in annual inventory. Following that, Arroyo joined a point-of-purchase display, store fixture, and merchandising solutions company as the Director of Operations, where he helped grow revenue by 100%, through the implementation of an e-commerce campaign and an advanced logistics program. Arroyo also managed the companyâ€™s global supply chain, end-to-end. Arroyo received a Bachelor of Arts in Business Management Economics from the University of California at Santa Cruz, and a MBA from San Diego State University.

Arroyo was invited to the 2008 TC50, where he launched Galaxy.
